remarks: Equivalence of two versions of the Axiom of Choice.  The right-hand side is Axiom AC of [BellMachover] p. 488.  The proof does not depend on AC. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
dfac4 $p |- ( CHOICE <-> A. x E. f ( f Fn x /\ A. z e. x ( z =/= (/) -> ( f ` z ) e. z ) ) ) $.
$d f x z $.
